import { useState } from "react"; import Close from "../../Images/times-solid.svg" import socket from "../../socket"; import "./modal.scss"; const Modal = ({ show, close }) => { const [ data, setData ] = useState({ title: '', heading: '', context: '', url: '', avatar: '', }) function handlerChange(event){ const {name, value} = event.target; setData(prevInput => { return{ ...prevInput, [name]:value } }) } console.log(data) return(
{ show ?
close()}>
